source: それはちょっとリスク高い。
seed: That's a bit of a high risk.

casual_50.reverse_translation: それはかなり高いリスクです。

polite_25.reverse_translation: それはかなりハイリスクですね。

polite_50.new_translation: It does appear to be quite high-risk.
polite_50.reverse_translation: それはかなりハイリスクのようですね。

polite_75.new_translation: It certainly seems to be quite high-risk.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 確かにかなりリスクが高いようです。

polite_100.new_translation: It appears to be extremely high-risk.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 確かに非常にリスクが高いようです

business_25.reverse_translation: これはかなりのリスクです。

business_50.reverse_translation: かなりのリスクがあります

business_75.reverse_translation: こちらはかなりのリスクがあります。

business_100.reverse_translation: これは大きなリスクです

source: 今日の納期、明日に延びました。
seed: The deadline for today has been extended to tomorrow.

casual_25.new_translation: Today's deadline has been pushed to tomorrow.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで延びました。

casual_50.new_translation: The deadline for today got pushed to tomorrow.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで延びた。

casual_75.new_translation: Today's deadline just got bumped to tomorrow.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで伸びた。

casual_100.new_translation: Today's deadline just got moved to tomorrow.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで延びた。

polite_25.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

polite_50.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow as of now.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました

polite_75.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow, effective immediately.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は、現在より明日まで正式に延長されました。

polite_100.new_translation: It is with utmost formality that I must inform you that the deadline for today has been officially and formally extended to tomorrow, effective immediately.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は、至急正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_25.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_50.new_translation: The deadline for today has been formally extended to tomorrow.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日に延長されました。

business_75.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日の締め切りは正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_100.new_translation: The deadline for today has been formally extended to tomorrow.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

source: ありがとう、対応助かります。
seed: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

casual_25.new_translation: Thank you, I really appreciate your help.
casual_25.reverse_translation: ありがとう、あなたの助けを本当に感謝している

casual_50.new_translation: Thanks a ton for your help, I really appreciate it!
casual_50.reverse_translation: すごく助かった、ありがとう

casual_75.new_translation: Thanks a million for your help, I super appreciate it!
casual_75.reverse_translation: ありがとーん助かった！超感謝してる！

casual_100.new_translation: Thanks a ton for your help, I totally appreciate it!
casual_100.reverse_translation: ありがとーん助かった！超感謝してる！

polite_25.new_translation: I appreciate your help, thank you.
polite_25.reverse_translation: ご助けいただき、ありがとうございます。

polite_50.new_translation: I am grateful for your assistance, thank you.
polite_50.reverse_translation: ご助力を賜り、ありがとうございます。

polite_75.new_translation: I would like to express my sincere gratitude for your assistance.
polite_75.reverse_translation: ご助力をいただき、心より感謝申し上げます。

polite_100.new_translation: I am deeply grateful for your support and assistance.
polite_100.reverse_translation: ご支援とご助力に深く感謝しております.

business_25.new_translation: Thank you, I appreciate your assistance.
business_25.reverse_translation: ありがとう、ご対応助かります。

business_50.reverse_translation: ご協力を賜り、感謝しております。

business_75.new_translation: I would like to extend my sincere gratitude for your assistance.
business_75.reverse_translation: ご助力を賜り、心より感謝申し上げます

business_100.new_translation: I am deeply grateful for your support.
business_100.reverse_translation: ご協力いただき、心より感謝申し上げます。

source: それ、聞いた限りだと怪しい。

casual_25.new_translation: Sounds suspicious, from what I've heard.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 聞いた話じゃ怪しい感じがする。

casual_50.new_translation: Sounds kinda suspicious, from what I've heard.
casual_50.reverse_translation: なんか怪しい気がする

casual_75.new_translation: Sounds pretty suspicious, from what I've heard.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると結構怪しい感じがする。

casual_100.new_translation: Sounds super shady, from what I've heard.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によるとかなり怪しい感じがする。

polite_25.reverse_translation: 少し怪しいように思います

polite_75.reverse_translation: ちょっと怪しいと思う

polite_100.reverse_translation: 少し怪しいと思うんです。

business_25.new_translation: It appears suspicious, based on what I've heard.
business_25.reverse_translation: それ、聞いた限りだと怪しい。

business_50.new_translation: It seems rather suspicious, based on what I've heard.
business_50.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、かなり怪しいようです。

business_75.new_translation: It appears to be somewhat suspicious, based on what I have heard.
business_75.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、少し怪しいようです。

business_100.new_translation: It appears to be somewhat suspicious, based on what I have heard.
business_100.reverse_translation: 少し怪しいようです、聞いた話によると。

source: 今日はもう何も考えられない。
seed: I can't think of anything else today.

casual_25.new_translation: I don't have the mental space for anything else today.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日は他に考えられない

casual_50.new_translation: I'm all tapped out mentally for today.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日はもう頭が回らない

casual_75.new_translation: I'm totally mentally spent for today.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日は完全に頭が回らない

casual_100.new_translation: I'm completely brain dead for today.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日は完全に頭が回らない

polite_25.new_translation: I'm unable to think about anything else today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日は他に考えられないんです。

polite_50.new_translation: I am presently incapable of focusing on anything else.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 現在、他のことを考えることができません。

polite_75.new_translation: At present, I find myself unable to focus on anything else.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 現在、私は他のことに集中することができません。

polite_100.new_translation: Currently, I am utterly incapable of concentrating on anything else.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 現在、私は全く他のことを考えることができません。

business_25.new_translation: I'm not thinking about anything else today.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日はもう何も考えられない。

business_50.new_translation: I am not contemplating any other matters at present.
business_50.reverse_translation: 現在、他のことは考えておりません。

business_75.new_translation: At this time, I am not considering any additional matters.
business_75.reverse_translation: 現在、他の事項は考えておりません

business_100.new_translation: Currently, I am not contemplating any supplementary issues.
business_100.reverse_translation: 現在、追加で検討している事項はございません。
